tool_description: Open proxy IP:Port lists, curated by ProxyMesh.  Proxy lists include 200-400 open proxies, checked for functionality every 15 minutes. However, this does not guarantee the proxies will still be functional at retrieval time. IP lists are returned as plain text, with 1 IP:port per line.
title: Open Proxies

api_list.name: Open Proxies
api_list.description: Get a list of 200-400 working open proxies, updated every 15 minutes. Because they can go up & down, these IPs may not be functional when you retrieve them. For higher reliability, consider a [paid proxy service](https://proxymesh.com/).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://open-proxies.p.rapidapi.com/proxies"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "open-proxies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hourly Open Proxies
api_list.description: Get a list of 200-400 working open proxies, updated every hour. Because they can go up & down, these IPs may not be functional when you retrieve them. For higher reliability, try the **Open Proxies** endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://open-proxies.p.rapidapi.com/hourly"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "open-proxies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Daily Open Proxies
api_list.description: Get a list of 200-400 open proxies, updated once per day around 00:00 UTC.  Because they can go up & down, these IPs may not be functional when you retrieve them. For higher reliability, try the **Hourly** or **Open Proxies** endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://open-proxies.p.rapidapi.com/daily"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "open-proxies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
